data.name: Ecchi Spirit
data.detailed_description:
Takeshi is a famous exorcist. He had heard about horrible forest spirits attacking people in a small village. Upon arrival, he found out that those spirits are only interested in young maidens and are not really trying to hurt anyone. They want something else...
Use your exorcism skills to find spirits and chase them away. Unfortunately, it is not an easy task because those perverted spirits love to stick to a girl’s body, sometimes in the most lovely places.

Ecchi Spirit is a point-and-click arcade game focused on erotic experience. The game is fully 3D, and you can rotate the camera as you like. Play more to unlock new girls, new exorcism rites, and special events.

  • Beautiful girls, each with her personality and story. Talk to them or strip them naked!
  • Various exorcism rites with multiple types of nasty spirits.
  • Intriguing story in the form of a visual novel.
  • The Combo system rewards you for playing smart.
  • You can play with only one hand...

data.short_description: Takeshi is a famous exorcist. He had heard about horrible forest spirits attacking people in a small village. Upon arrival, he found out that those spirits are only interested in young maidens... Ecchi Spirit is a point-and-click arcade game focused on erotic experience.
data.supported_languages: English, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, Russian, Japanese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100, AMD FX-4100
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD4600, Nvidia GT730
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7400, AMD Ryzen 1200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX760, AMD RX550
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:

linux_requirements.recommended:

content_descriptors.notes:
Partial and full nudity. Strong language and suggestive themes.
Suggestive poses and animations for heroines. The player is able to focus the camera on private body parts. Sexual interactions.
All characters are 18+.
